title: What Doctors Don't Tell You - November 2017 (gnv64)
description: What Doctors Don't Tell You - November 2017 English | 84 pages | True PDF | 35.4 mb = 8 ways to heal your gut 28 Find out how Dane Johnson battled Crohn's and colitis with food—and won = The myth of antibiotic 'courses' 26 New research shows that you don't have to complete a course of antibiotics = The healing powers of vitamin D 58 High dosages of vitamin D can help to repair skin damage and more, says Cate Montana = Natural ways to fight cold 76 In herHealthyShoppingedit,Joanna Evans hassixcoldandfluremediesthatreallywork = 'How I beat crippling knee pain' 66 Angela MacRitchie thought she's have to take painkillers for life to manage her knee pain— until she discovered a natural approach NEWS News 8 Just one e-cigarette starts first stages of heart disease; eat walnuts for a healthy gut Drug news 17 Doctors ignoring safety guidelines on heart drugs; statins aren't for everyone, despite the guidelines NEWS FOCUS Take this pill, it won't do a thing for youg 20 Entrepreneur Robert Richman is taking the placebo pill to the next stage HEALTHY LIVING Spicing upthe holidays! 39 Kirsten Hartvig has a sweet and spicy cake recipe that's healthy and delicious Do the twist 42 Try these twist stretches to increase your range of motion in every direction, says Charlotte Watts FAMILY HEALTH A calming influenced 51 Holistic vet Rohini Sathish has a host of tips on how to deal with an aggressive pet dog ALTERNATIVES Change one thing: try qigong 72 This ancient Chinese healing modality is showing promise for many modern health problems HEALTHY SHOPPING In the mood 74 Six aroma therapy products to help reset your mind REGULARS = Readers'letters 2 = The politics of heatth 25 When conspiracy theory becomes conspiracy fact = The integrative GP 49 A change of diet can treat chronic pain, even bunions, says Dr Sarah Myhill = Practitioner directory 80 Listings for complementary and alternative practitioners in the UK = Resources and coming next month 81 Find out more about the topics covered in this issue and what's in store for the next = The last word 82 Traditional Chinese medicine has much to teach us,says Bryan Hubbard https://s1.postimg.org/4c4xebkln3/What_Doctors_Don_t_Tell_You_-_November_2017.jpg
